p: Accordingly, the intentions of this study were: (a) to study the influence of seven drying techniques (shade‐, sunlight‐, freeze‐, oven (40, 60, and 80°C) and microwave‐drying) on the EO composition and yield in S. lavandulifolia, (b) to determine the best drying method in respect of maintaining the principal EO compositions of the S. lavandulifolia and, (c) to investigate the impact of various drying methods on the biological properties.
